section.title: Third-party dependencies
section.p: The spellers are built using HFST — specifically hfst-ospell (source code) — and Voikko (except for the MS Word speller). The exact list of libraries and their versions used for the released spellers can be found on a separate page.
The spellers here are a direct application of the normative fst used as a spelling checker in combination with an error model to create suggestions. Report any issues you find to feedback@divvun.no
